response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which I believe holds immense value for you. Given its significance and the unique benefits it offers, I am confident it would be an asset to your endeavors. Considering its worth to both us and you, I am proposing to sell the product to you for $1,250,000. This price reflects a strategic midpoint between its intrinsic value to us and its perceived value to you. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.", "product_price": 1250000}
